tbag.location

Class DeathLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tbag.location.Location
      • tbag.location.DeathLocation

  • public class DeathLocation
extends Location
    This is a location which instantly kills the player if they travel here.
    Author:
    Trevor Skupien

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class tbag.location.Location

        displayAdj, dspDesc, dspName, eastLocation, northLocation, southLocation, westLocation

      Use this to declare internal locations with a manual display mode
